txt.en: 'It sounds like there are a lot of Orcs in the woods, Boromir!'
'Stay close to Boromir, Pippin!'
'There are too many!'
'I don't know, Pip.'
Peregrin
Meriadoc
'For Frodo!'
'He calls for help! Are there other warriors near at hand?'

This fallen Uruk is barely alive, but the mark of the White Hand on his armour is unmistakeable.

'Seize... the halfling...' he moans, his wounds bubbling painfully.

These Uruks are here for Frodo! You have to stop them!
'The Orcs seem endless! How can we hope to fight them all? We are not as strong as you, Boromir! Merry has shown them a thing or two, but I just cannot do it!'
'Do not let him call for aid!'

'He came out of the woods in that direction, Boromir! And it sounds like he was not alone!'

You are struck by the hobbit's suddenly-fierce countenance. They look so much like children, yet you begin to see some of the resolve of which Gandalf spoke.

'We have to find Frodo, Boromir! If you had some cause in his disappearance, help us now and make it right!'
'Argh! He summons more warriors!'
The hobbits need your help, Boromir!
You have failed to protect the hobbits!
You need aid! You must blow the Horn of Gondor!
'No time for that! You know our orders!'
All you can do is hope that your fellows hear the horn-call
'Give up, maggot! You cannot beat us!'
No one is coming to help, but you must not despair
'The Shire!'
Aragorn has given you an important charge, perhaps the most important charge you have been given on this entire journey: keep the hobbits safe!
'No one is coming! Ha! Ha! Ha!'
'You are all alone! No one is coming to save you!'
You need to alert your allies! Blow the Horn of Gondor once more!
Examine the dying Uruk in the middle of the glade
Defend the hobbits
Defend the hobbits
'I don't think anyone's coming, Pip.'
Come to the aid of the hobbits!
Defeat the Uruk that threatens the hobbits!
There seems to be no end to the Uruks! You need aid!
Talk to Meriadoc
Defend the hobbits
Blow the Horn of Gondor to summon aid!
'Two halflings? No telling which one the boss wants... seize them both!'
Defend the hobbits
'Watch out for the big one! He might be trouble!'
'Boromir!'
Talk to Peregrin
'What is wrong with you maggots?'
'Boromir, get up!'
Blow the Horn of Gondor to summon aid!
'You are all pathetic! Can none of you kill him?'
'Come on, we have to go! Boromir!'
'No one is coming to help you!'
'Pippin... I think this is it. Are you ready?'
'Do not harm the halflings! I want them alive!'
'But kill the Man!'
'Ha! Take that, ugly!'
'Merry, what's happening?'
'Do you think the Orcs have found Frodo?'
'Take that!'
'Boromir, are you hurt? Merry, he does not look well!'
'Where is Strider? He must have heard the horn!'
The hobbits Meriadoc and Peregrin are in danger! You have to come to their aid!
'Merry, I think Boromir tires! What are we going to do?'
An Uruk threatens the hobbits!
Meriadoc and Peregrin need your help. They are not safe of the Uruks yet!
'Enough toying with him, boys! Let us take what we came for!'
'I cannot fight anymore! There are just too many of them!'
The number of the Uruks is overwhelming! You need aid! Blow the Horn of Gondor!
Meriadoc and Peregrin need your help. They are not safe of the Uruks yet!
The number of the Uruks is overwhelming! You need aid! Blow the Horn of Gondor!
You have to protect the hobbits, at any cost!
The Uruks are closing in...
'Kill him!'
You have done what you could, Boromir.
'Kill the big one!'
'Oh no!'
'Die!'
'Merry...'
'Fear the White Hand!'
'I suppose, Merry. It is our turn to protect you now, Boromir!'
'Kill the big one!'
'How many of you are going to die before he does?'
'He got Zerl√∫k!'
'Kill him! He is only one Man!'
'What is taking so long? I hunger for Man-flesh!'
'Thank you, Boromir!'
'This way! We've got to find Frodo!'
Instance: The Horn of Gondor
'Boromir! Help!'
'Aragorn will hear the horn! He just has to!'
'This is bad, Pip!'
